  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030814</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030814</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Virus</string>
            <string language="en">Viruses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Viren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Virus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vírus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Virus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιοί</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se explica la estructura de los virus y los criterios de clasificación. Además contiene una ampliación de contenidos sobre los priones, trasposones y viroides. También se explica el ciclo de infección lítico y lisogénico.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the structure of viruses and the criteria for their classification. It also contains additional contents on prions, transposons and viroids. It also explains the cycle of lithic and lysogenic infection.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Virus</string>
            <string language="en">Virus</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die Struktur der Viren und die 
Kriterien für ihre Klassifikation erklärt. Sie enthält auch 
zusätzlichen Inhalt auf prions, transposons und viroids. Sie 
erklärt auch die Schleife der lithic und lysogenen Infektion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant la structure des virus et les 
critères pour leur classification. Elle contient également 
le contenu supplémentaire sur des prions, des transposons et des
viroids. Elle explique également le cycle de l'infection lithic
et lysogène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explica a estrutura dos vírus e os 
critérios para sua classificação. Contem também índices 
adicionais em prions, em transposons e em viroids. Explica 
também o ciclo da infecção lithic e lysogenic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiega la struttura dei virus ed i 
test di verifica per la loro classificazione. Egualmente 
contiene il soddisfare supplementare sui prions, sui transposons e sui
viroids. Egualmente spiega il ciclo dell'infezione lithic e 
lisogena.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί τη δομή των ιών και τα κριτήρια για 
την ταξινόμησή τους. Περιέχει επίσης το πρόσθετο 
περιεχόμενο στα prions, transposons και τα viroids. 
Εξηγεί επίσης τον κύκλο της λιθικής και λυσογενούς 
μόλυνσης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Virus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Virus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vírus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Virus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιός</string>
          </keyword>
